long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Anime reminder and upcoming episode tracker.

Animinder has many features including:
- displaying the user's anime and broadcast times (in the user's timezone) based off of their MAL account.
- reminding the user to watch episodes as they air
- provides links to each anime
